html:
{{doc.company}}

Ref- {{doc.name}}

Date - {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_joining).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }}

{{ _("Appointment Letter") }}

{% set employee_full_name = ((doc.salutation+".")or(" ")) + (" " + doc.employee_name) %}

To,

{{employee_full_name}}
Emp Code - {{doc.employee_code}}
{{_("Address")}} - {{", ".join(doc.address.split(","))}}

Dear {{employee_full_name}},

Dear {{employee_full_name}}, {%- set text = "With reference to your application and subsequent interview held with us, we have great pleasure to offer you employment as " + doc.designation + " in " + doc.parent_department + " Department in our organization , the terms and conditions mentioned below." -%} {{_(text)}}

  1. Your appointment commences from {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_joining).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }} and your monthly emoluments will be as given in the enclosed annexure.
  2. In addition to the above you will be allowed Leave with wages as per the factory act.1948.
  3. You will be on probation for a period of six months with effect from your date of joining {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_joining).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }} which can be further extended at the discretion of the management.
  4. Your services will automatically come to an end on the expiry of the probation period, unless specifically confirmed in writing, you will remain on probation after the expiry of the probation period or the extended period of probation, your appointment can be terminated without assigning any reason. Unless an order in writing confirming, you are issued, you will not be deemed to have been made permanent.
  5. During your employment you will discharge your duties, efficiently and diligently to the best of your ability and shall devote your whole time and attention to the interest to the company and generally Carry out duties and work as assigned to you and shall obey and comply with all the lawful orders and directions given to you by your superiors.You shall honestly, diligently and faith fully serves the organization and uses your utmost endeavor to promote the interest of the company.
  6. You will be just and a faithful employee of the company in all matters and shall not at any time expect under the legal process with prior written approval divulge to any person and shall use your best endeavor to prevent the publication or disclosure of any trade secret of manufacturing processor any other information concerning, or in respect of the items as manufactured or marketed by the company or dealing transactions or affairs, which may your knowledge.
  7. Further, you will not give to any one, by word of mouth or otherwise any particulars/or details of our manufacturing process technical know -how, security arrangements, administrative and / organizational matters whether confidential, secret or otherwise which you acquire during the course of your employment at any time, while in employment or afterwards. Failure to observe, this condition would be considered a gross misconduct entailing dismissal from service.
  8. That during the period of your employment, you will not work directly or indirectly for any other person, firm or company either with or without remuneration, nor will you engage yourself or be interested directly or indirectly. in any trade or business either as employer or employee or partner or advisor or in any other capacity.
  9. The appointment or its continuance is further subject to your remaining medically, physically and mentally fit. You shall appear before the medical officer of the company or any medical practitioner nominated for the purpose of medical examination and /or health survey as and when required you will submit to such medical examination as required and failing to do so would be considered a gross misconduct entailing dismissal from service.
  10. Your services are liable to be transferred /assigned any wherein India to any office Establishment /Branch or any other concern of the company and its associates.
  11. If You are found absent for ten consecutive days without express permission in Writing to the management or if you proceed on leave without prior sanction or over stay the sanctioned leave without obtaining sanction ,your services shall automatically come to an end and a presumption will be drawn that you have abandoned the employment of your own accord and you will be liable to give one month salary in lieu thereof , which will be adjustment from payment of your salary or other benefits .
  12. Any material, instrument, gold, silver, precious stones given by the company for the working shall be at your responsibility and you will be responsible to keep them in safe Intact and good condition and will deliver the same in safe condition to the management. In case of damage or loss of material, you shall alone be responsible for the same and management will be entitled to recover the said loss from you.
  13. In case of any change in the address during the course of your employment with the management it shall be your duty to intimate the same in writing within three days from such change and shall also get the change so effected recorded.
  14. That all communication sent to you by the management at your last given address shall be deemed to have been delivered to you at correct address.
  15. In case any act, Omission constituting misconduct is alleged against you, you may be placed under suspension allowances as per standing order or rules of the company.
  16. You shall be governed by rules and regulations of the company / standing orders and work according to directions /Instructions given to you from time to time.
  17. You will not wear jeans pent and shirt on the duty because it is against Security norms as they are not satisfied while checking in Jeans.
  18. That you shall retire on the age of 58 years without any Notice.
  19. After confirmation of your appointment, your services shall be terminable at any time without assigning any reason, by giving one month’s notice or consolidated salary in lieu of notice period similarly If you want to leave the service of the company you are required to give one month’s notice in advance, failing which the company shall recover amount equivalent to one-month salary from the dues if any payable and if the amount is not sufficient than from you personally.

If the above terms and conditions of the offer of employment are acceptable to you, please sign the duplicate copy of this letter and return to us.

For M/S PINKCITY JEWELHOUSE PVT.LTD.

Authorized Signatory

DECLARATION BY THE EMPLOYEE

I accept the offer and the terms and conditions mentioned in the aforesaid letter.

Signature of the Employee

Annexure-1

Employee Name

{{doc.employee_name}}

Date of Joining

{{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_joining).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }}

Department

{{doc.parent_department}}

Designation

{%- if doc.designation -%} {{doc.designation.title()}} {%- else -%} - {%- endif -%}

{%- with json_data = json.loads(doc.json_data), sdata={"et":0, "dt":0, "pf":0, "esi":0, "wa":0, "employer_esi":0}, print_data=[] -%} {%- for comp in json_data.earnings -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : comp.name, "value" : comp.value, "abbr" : comp.abbr, "is_total" : False, "type":"earnings"}) -%} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"et" : sdata.et + comp.value}) -%} {%- if comp.abbr.lower() == "wa" -%} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"wa" : sdata.wa + comp.value}) -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for comp in json_data.deductions -%} {%- if comp.abbr == "PF" -%} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"pf" : (sdata.pf + comp.value)|round}) -%} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"dt" : (sdata.dt + comp.value)|round}) -%} {% elif comp.abbr == "ESIC" %} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"esi" : (sdata.esi + comp.value)|round}) -%} {%- else -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : comp.name, "value" : comp.value, "abbr" : comp.abbr, "is_total" : False, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"dt" : (sdata.dt + comp.value)|round}) -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Gross Total", "value" : sdata.et|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : True, "type":"earnings"}) -%} {% if sdata.esi > 0 %} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"employer_esi" : (sdata.employer_esi + (sdata.et-sdata.wa)*(0.0325))|round}) -%} {% else %} {%- set _ = sdata.update({"employer_esi" : 0}) -%} {% endif %} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Less Employee Provident Fund", "value" : sdata.pf|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : False, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Less Employee ESIC", "value" : sdata.esi|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : False, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Net Payable", "value" : (sdata.et-(sdata.pf+sdata.esi))|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : True, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Add Employer Provident Fund", "value" : sdata.pf|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : False, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Add Employer ESIC", "value" : sdata.employer_esi|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : False, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- set _ = print_data.append({"name" : "Cost to Company", "value" : (sdata.et+sdata.dt+sdata.employer_esi)|round|int, "abbr" : "", "is_total" : True, "type":"deductions"}) -%} {%- for pd in print_data -%} {%- if not pd.is_total and pd.type == "earnings" -%} {%- elif pd.type == "earnings" -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for pd in print_data -%} {%- if not pd.is_total and pd.type == "deductions" -%} {%- elif pd.type == "deductions" -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
S.No. Particuler Amount

{{loop.index}}

{{pd.name}}

{{pd.value|round|int}}

{{loop.index}}

{{pd.name}}

{{pd.value|round|int}}

{{loop.index}}

{{pd.name}}

{{pd.value|round|int}}

{{loop.index}}

{{pd.name}}

{{pd.value|round|int}}

{%- endwith -%}

INDIA PHONE: +91 141 2955079, Mobile: 09773379014 E-mail: hr2@pinkcityindia.com Website: www.pinkcityindia.com

name: Appointment Letter Pinkcity
